General.Name: Zhejiang Tengen Electrics Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Tengen Electrics Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial electrical products in China. The company offers low-voltage power distribution and industrial control appliances, smart instruments, power appliances, frequency converters, high-voltage appliances, and construction appliances. It also provides distribution appliances, including universal circuit breakers, molded case circuit breakers, leakage circuit breakers, automatic transfer switches, knife switches, isolation, load switches, transformers, fuses, and stabilizers; and terminal appliances, such as miniature circuit breakers, residual current operated circuit breakers, isolation switches, circuit breaker accessories, arc fault protection circuit breakers, over voltage protectors, surge protectors, spd backup protectors, and metal distribution boxes. In addition, the company offers control appliances comprising relays, button signal lights, motor control and protection switches, reactive power compensation controllers, and reactors; instrument products, including analog indicating electrical measuring instruments, electronic energy meters, digital indicating electrical measuring instruments, smart meters, and prepaid electricity meters; and high voltage electrical appliances, such as medium and low voltage power distribution cabinets, indoor vacuum circuit breakers, outdoor vacuum circuit breakers, and disconnector & load switches. Zhejiang Tengen Electrics Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Yueqing, China.

1.Name: Mr. Yong  Wang
